snippet: The Mets overcame a poor effort by R. A. Dickey and the ejection of Manager Terry Collins to take a two-run lead in the eighth, but Atlanta scored three times to grab an 8-7 victory.
abstract: Atlanta Braves defeat New York Mets, 8-7.
lead_paragraph: The Mets overcame a poor effort by R. A. Dickey and the ejection of Manager Terry Collins to take a two-run lead in the eighth, but Atlanta scored three times to grab an 8-7 victory.

headline.seo: Mets Stage Late Rally, but Lose When Braves Answer With One of Their Own
headline.main: Mets Stage Late Rally, but Lose When Braves Answer With Their Own
headline.print_headline: Mets Stage a Rally, but Lose When the Braves Answer With Their Own
